text: Michael Shea (1946 - February 16, 2014) was an American writer. His genres included fantasy, horror, and science fiction. He has won "year's best" World Fantasy Awards for the novel Nifft the Lean and the novella Growlimb. He was born in Culver City, California. Michael Shea died unexpectedly on February 16, 2014. He was 67 years old.
